channel.description: can some1 give me a tut or a link to one that shows how to make my own no-ip server?[br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2006, 02:55:24 PM[/size][hr]can any1 help meh?[br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2006, 03:01:08 PM[/size][hr]or give me a link or tut on how to make a HAM server..?[br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2006, 03:03:30 PM[/size][hr]OMFG!!! some1 please help me :mad:

item.title: How do i even make a no-ip server? ~Chaotic~ OR Zirakac please help me
item.dc:creator: @Zirakac Zirakac
item.description:
@Zirakac wrote:

Yes, Ham is much easier to setup…
Although people prefer No-Ip more because you don’t need to download Hamachi.
That is why I also use no-ip…
I can help because I am also port forwarding for no-ip.
~Zirak

item.source: How do i even make a no-ip server? ~Chaotic~ OR Zirakac please help me

item.title: How do i even make a no-ip server? ~Chaotic~ OR Zirakac please help me
item.dc:creator: @Zirakac Zirakac
item.description:
@Zirakac wrote:

skater chick:

like i want to make a server so that i can play and be the owner and have people join. like the ones advertised. i wanna edit stuff and add stuff. [br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2006, 04:04:49 PM[/size][hr]i cant even get on it… i made the ip and i cant get on to play

If you have a server then run the runserver.bat
and then Use any tutorial for no-ip to set it up once your done just tell people your no-ip and port number
you can get your port number when you runserver.bat
for example

Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

43594 is your port which is default. So you just need to tell them your no-ip and port
they will type it in voila people are in your server.
But if you have a router you will need to port forward.
Hope I helped!
~Zirak

Read full topic

item.title: How do i even make a no-ip server? ~Chaotic~ OR Zirakac please help me
item.dc:creator: @Zirakac Zirakac
item.description:
@Zirakac wrote:

skater chick:

okay 1 sec ill check it out[br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2006, 03:51:48 PM[/size][hr]okay i did that but how do i do everything else? like get on, add stuff, ect.?

You can get on, But if you players cannot it must be your Router Firewall…
Please use a portforwarding tutorial for routers…
If you don’t have a router it should be really simple.
Please use the search button.
Thank Me if I helped.
~Zirak

Read full topic
